name: Golben
description:
Golben is a rpg made by me and this game is still being worked on in my spare time most assets were made in aesprite and game the was developed in unity i hope you love this small beginner project i am developing thank you so much if your reading this it means a lot to me even if one person plays it and likes it or even don't like it. plz send feedback. once again thank you

What is Golben

Your name is Ben and you have a normal life and you go to work everday do the same thing over and over nothing new until one day you went to sleep and you had a dream that changed your life you woke up in a place where ever one is loved and  your goblin. theres also such thing as magic but heres the catch you wakeup and go back to the boring real life days and the player goal is stir  bens life to be better quit his job and persue something he loves.

*Disclaimer*

This game is still being worked on so things might change in the future like the story or the actual dimensions of the game itself . and also i am still in highschool so yea making games is my passion and i hope that people will support and love my creations because im going to put a lot of love into them
